attributes.action: call upon the US Government for the immediate and unconditional release of British Resident, Binyam Mohammed on medical grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a recent medical report and letter from counsel advising grave concern for the steadily deteriorating mental and physical health of Binyam Mohamed, a British resident currently detained in Guantanamo Bay and whose release was one of five requested by Secretary Miliband in August, we call for the British Government to urgently request the US Government immediately release Mr Mohamed on medical and humanitarian grounds and allow his safe return to the United Kingdom and to furthermore request that pending his release US authorities detaining Mr Mohamed immediately desist from torturing Mr Mohamed and that they provide him with water, a clean and sanitary environment and immediate medical care

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
